props.description: The Technology Technician Program is a 36-month initiative that includes one year of academic instruction and two years of practical experience. Participants receive instruction in topics such as Cloud Administration, Python Programming, and Data Engineering. The program seeks individuals who demonstrate strong potential for leadership and innovation in technical fields.

content: Eligible Applicants: Entry to Mid-Level Professionals

props.description: The competitive Scholar Program offers 22-month Masterâ€™s and 36-month PhD opportunities focused on data analytics, data engineering, and autonomous systems. Participants are expected to engage in a follow-on assignment supporting innovation and applied research upon completion.
